subject: Baseball
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: While there has been no official financing agreement reached with the city, the Cubs indicated for the first time that the Ricketts family may be prepared to pay for Wrigley Field renovations.
snippet: While there has been no official financing agreement reached with the city, the Cubs indicated for the first time that the Ricketts family may be prepared to pay for Wrigley Field renovations.
